review: The device arrived quickly, nicely packaged and in great shape.  We basically just hooked it up and plugged it in as directed.  It was already set up for our account, so we could immediately use it with our wireless service.  It works pretty intuitively, and we were really happy with the voice search feature - so simple to use.  Movies downloaded very quickly.  The ability to put our pictures on the TV (through amazon cloud, as per simple directions) was a big bonus! We're very happy that we made the purchase - well worth it!
author: DMS

review: I absolutely love Amazon Fire TV!!! It is so great being able to watch all the movies and TV shows I get with my Prime membership now on my TV instead of my computer or tablet. It is such great quality picture! The install was super easy (a 2 step process) just plug in power and HDTV cord and off I went on setting it up. If you already have an Amazon account, set-up is pretty much all set, you just have to connect to WiFi!I would recommend this to anybody!
author: Coutry1621

review: Amazon fire tv does exactly what it says it does and does it well.  I am surprised at the speed and ease of use of the unit.  It is so easy that my 2 yr old can press the button and tell it what show he wants and it goes there.  Only disappointment is the remote.  I want the remote to have more functionality such as volume control and power.  I would also like a linked app that I can use to control the device.

author: Brandi

review: I have been shopping on Amazon for over 10 years, and I've never written a review for a product before.  But the Fire TV is such an amazing product.  I had purchased a Chromecast last year for the bedroom, and it was just awesome for what we needed.  When the Fire TV came out, I thought I would give it a shot and put it in the living room.  Boy was I surprised.  This thing tremendously exceeded my expectations.  It has been so easy to use, that I now look at the Chromecast in the bedroom with despair.  We are considering getting a second Fire TV to replace the Chromecast in our bedroom.  I highly highly recommend this product to anyone that likes streaming Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Instant Video, etc...  This product is just too good to pass up.P.S.  This is the first product outside of the Netflix webpage app that I've ever seen do auto-play, which has always miffed me about all of my other streaming devices.
